meanings.sent1: The paper was unwrinkled after I carefully smoothed it out.
meanings.sent2: Her unwrinkled dress looked elegant and neat.
meanings.sent3: I tried to keep my unwrinkled shirt away from the mischievous puppy.
meanings.sent4: The unwrinkled surface of the lake reflected the clear blue sky perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The unwrinkled fabric felt soft and pleasant against my skin.

meanings.sent1: The unwrinkled bedsheet looked inviting and cozy.
meanings.sent2: His unwrinkled face showed no signs of stress or worry.
meanings.sent3: She proudly displayed her unwrinkled diploma on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The unwrinkled map guided us smoothly through the unfamiliar city.
meanings.sent5: The unwrinkled petals of the flower glistened in the morning dew.
